Description: grumpy,most of the day out,self-centred,enjoy gossip about lifestyles of other villagers
friendly,excitable,come out of their homes often,always excited to see player,short attention span,wild imaginations,share their claims to stardom
caring,protective,blunt,straightforward,tomboyish,tendency to stay up until very late,give player medicine when player stung by wasps
relaxed,easygoing,hobbies include fishing,catching bugs,digging fossils,planting flowers,often ask player to catch bug or dig fossils etc.,tend to dramatise when sick
sweet,sweetie,mother-like,lack of self-worth,slightly obsessive with cleanliness and hygiene,usually talk about other villagers and seldom themselves,enjoy cooking and will ask player about food
snobby,act more mature and higher-class,well-spoken and appear offensive and rude,self-centred,hot-tempered,sarcastic
